attributes.additional_details: Because renaming a street is a councils job and it need a plaque of some sorts.
attributes.background: Change the name of the street that runs from Manor Pharmacy on Limes avenue to Rodgers Lane Officially Onion Cob Lane due to the graffiti that is a homage to Lloyd. A local legend who ran the local burger wagon who sadly went blind and could no longer run his van.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
